column2: "So, as a Ranger, right? Sometimes you might find yourself daydreaming while you attack things."
"Like, why is the recoil from the gun is the same for every shot, but an enemy's recoil from receiving each bullet isn't? Lisa doesn't really understand it much herself."
"When that happens, you just gotta stop thinking about it and keep doing fun stuff."
"And we both know what constitutes as fun stuff for a Ranger. Shooting! So just go wild."
"Hey! Speaking of going wild, what say you and Lisa go to the Desert? Let's make like the violent desert winds and go tear stuff up wheresoever we please!"
